isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - LEFT CYINDER HEAD/GASKET, REPLACE (RPS)

step1.para: Open door, chock wheels, open hood, disconnect hood support, and tie hood in full open position.
Remove front bumper, also disconnect battery.
Remove engine cover housing and floor panel to include floor panel by accelerator pedal.
Drain cooling system.
Remove both charge air pipes.
Disconnect and/or remove hose wire harness support clamps and brackets at frame area necessary to have access to left side valve cover.
Remove valve cover breather pipe at hose connection and remove pipe.
Remove valve cover from engine left side.
Disconnect wire connections at valve cover gasket and remove gasket.
Siphon oil from high pressure oil pump reservoir.
Remove oil galley plug from cylinder head.
Remove fuel injector oil return tubes and fuel injectors; use special tool.
Remove glow plugs.
Remove rocker arms and push rods.
Remove turbo inlet exhaust pipe from exhaust manifold and turbo.
Disconnect all oil pressure hoses and lines, fuel hoses and lines from cylinder head; include wire harness loom also.
Remove air intake plenum from cylinder head.
Disconnect power steering hose and drain catch fluid from reservoir.
Remove radiator support strut for access.
Remove cylinder head bolts.
Install lifting device to cylinder head.
Remove cylinder head from engine, lay on bench.
Clean block surface and head surface if replacing gasket.

note.para: If replacing cylinder head, clean block surface transfer fitting and sending unit from cylinder head to new head.

step1.para: Install new head gasket.
Install cylinder head in position.
Install cylinder head bolts finger tight.
Remove cylinder head lifting device.
Torque cylinder head bolts to spec.
Install air intake plenum and torque bolts to spec.
Connect power steering hose.
Connect all oil pressure hoses and lines, fuel hoses and lines to cylinder head.
Install turbo exhaust inlet pipe.
Install glow plugs and torque to spec.
Install push rods and rocker arms and torque bolts to spec.
Install fuel injectors and torque hold down bolt to spec.
Install injector oil return tube and torque bolt to spec.
Install oil galley plug to cylinder head and torque to spec.
Install valve cover gasket, and connect electrical connections to glow plug and injector.
Install valve cover and torque bolts to spec.
Install crankcase breather tube; use new hose clamp.
Connect wire harness to valve cover gasket. Connect all wire harness and hose support brackets and clamps to valve cover at frame area.
Fill high pressure oil reservoir.
Install radiator support struts.
Install both charge air pipes.
Install complete floor assembly and engine cover.
Drain engine oil and fill with clean oil.
Fill cooling system.
Bleed power steering system.
Connect battery, start engine and check for leaks.
Install bumper and hood support brackets; close hood.
Remove wheel chocks.
